content:
I apologize for the confusion earlier. I'm a large language model, I don't have have real-time information about every event, but I'm glad to hear that you had a great experience at the Global Tech Expo!

Now, to make the most out of your time at the Digital Marketing Summit, here are some suggestions:

1. **Plan your schedule in advance**: Take a close look at the summit's agenda and prioritize the sessions that align with your goals and interests. Make sure to leave some buffer time for networking and exploring the expo floor.
2. **Set clear objectives**: Identify what you want to achieve from the summit. Are you looking for new business opportunities, seeking inspiration for your marketing strategy, or wanting to learn about the latest industry trends? Having clear objectives will help you stay focused and make the most of your time.
3. **Network, network, network**: Attend networking sessions, join roundtable discussions, and introduce yourself to speakers, sponsors, and fellow attendees. You never know who might be able to help you with your marketing efforts or provide valuable insights.
4. **Take notes and follow up**: Take notes during sessions, and make sure to follow up with speakers or attendees who presented interesting ideas or offered valuable insights. This will help you remember key takeaways and potentially turn new connections into opportunities.
5. **Explore the expo floor**: The expo floor can be a treasure trove of new tools, services, and innovative solutions. Take time to explore and discover what's new and trending in the digital marketing space.
6. **Be prepared to ask questions**: Don't be afraid to ask questions during sessions or at the expo floor. This is your chance to get clarity on topics that interest you and demonstrate your engagement with the material.
7. **Stay organized**: Bring business cards, a notebook, and a portable charger to stay organized and connected throughout the summit.
8. **Follow the conversation on social media**: Keep an eye on the summit's social media channels and hashtags to stay up-to-date on the latest announcements, session highlights, and behind-the-scenes insights.

By following these tips, you'll be well on your way to making the most of your time at the Digital Marketing Summit. Enjoy the event, and I hope you come back with plenty of new ideas and connections!
